comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: What was the original surface of the Harbour Bridge roadway ?    In all the photos,  It seems to remind me of the surface of a clay tennis court.

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: C.H. Hay was head of the NSW Premier's Department...per his ADB entry he organised the Harbour Bridge opening - adb.anu.edu.au/biography/hay-clifford-henderson-6609 J.S. Cormack was at one point Director of the NSW Tourist Bureau, but I've got no idea whether that's who we see here. For info on the original deck surface, see this fascinating vid...from ca. 28:30 to ca. 30:00... www.youtube.com/watch?v=JPQ7CzVHdMs
